item.description:
Hi Everyone,

We're returning to the Mountain View Resort again this March with what I feel is a very very reasonable price for a wonderful weekend get-away at one of the most beautiful hotels in New England. The Mountain View Grand is one of the few Grand Hotels remaining from an era when grandiose hotels were plentiful in NH & Maine tourist areas. Go to link below to view the Flyer for more information or to sign-up for this wonderful winter weekend in NH White Mountains. I have 10 rooms reserved at the Mountain View Grand Hotel and this trip is sure to fill quickly so please don't delay in signing up if you'd like to go.

Trip includes:
  • 2 nights lodging at Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa
  • 2 Full Breakfasts in Hotel Dining Room
  • Indoor amenities including pool, fitness area & theatre
  • Outdoor amenities including Cross Country ski rails & Ice Skating Rink


Price: $219 Per Person based on double room occupancy

Click Here to view photos from last years trip to the Mountain View Grand

NOTE: Your RSVP will be added after you sign-up and make your payment for this trip.

Winter Weekend Get-Away to Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa

Payments can be made from the Web Site Link above or by sending a personal check to my address below. Please include your address and phone number on the check if you pay by check.

Neil Sheehan
763 Ocean Boulevard
Hampton, NH 03842
item.name: Winter Weekend Get-Away to Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa
